attributes.action: ask the people of England, via a referendum, whether they want Scotland to remain within the Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too often we hear about the Scotish people wanting to vote on their position within the Union, it is now about time that the people of England were asked the same question

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
